The Example Package
Example package This chapter describes the &GAP; package &Example;. As its name suggests it is an example of how to create a &GAP; package. It has little functionality except for being a package.

and for how to install, compile and load the &Example; package, or Appendix for guidelines on how to write a &GAP; package.

gap> ?Example package
to see the functions provided by the &Example; package.
